wpt.name: GC3N7W8
wpt.desc: The Main Drain by malign2099, Traditional Cache (1.5/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: The Main Drain
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: This cache is at Shadyside Park. Basketball, Tennis, baseball, hockey, volleyball, playground, horseshoes, bathroom, snack machines, pavillions, grills and now geocaching.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description: Take a nice stroll around the park. This cache will provide some excitement. This cache is contained in a small, green capped container.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: Similiar to the Sponge Bob Square Pants episode, this is were the water leaves the park.

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Took a few minutes, but 19acassel made the find.
